short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: URLink allows you to chat with people that are on the same website as you! Report Bugs and Problems: urlink.help@gmail.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Known bugs v 3.1.0:
1. Error pertaining to loading src scripts and firebase.
    Temporary solution: uninstall and reinstall extension

2. Username not showing and messages not loading.
    Caused by: chrome extension being installed on multiple platforms.
    Temporary solution: uninstall on all platforms and reinstall on main platform

Questions or to report other bugs: urlink.help@gmail.com 

Developer: Will Cuny
